topics: Parental Authority and Responsibility in Scripture
Teaching and Instruction of the Lord to Children
The Role of the Holy Spirit in Parenting
Provision and Protection of the Father
The Parable of the Prodigal Son and Grace
bibleStories: The Parable of the Prodigal Son
sentimentFlow: The sermon starts on a warm, appreciative note with personal stories honoring fathers, then shifts to a heavier tone highlighting parenting struggles, flawed biblical examples, and kids' rebellious human nature. It builds through practical, hopeful guidance on loving discipline and leadership, ending on an uplifting, encouraging high with assurances of God's help and a prayer blessing all fathers. Overall, the emotional arc moves from light reflection to mid-sermon weight of imperfection, rising to grace-filled empowerment.
